data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: This is my first Christmas in the United States, and I really am looking forward to celebrating with my new friends. I'm ____ to ____ around ____ see ____ the ____ lights ____ the ____ and ____, ____ sing ____ with ____ neighbors. If I'm lucky, I'll receive some thoughtful gifts too!
data.partBlankContent: This is my first Christmas in the United States, and I really am looking forward to celebrating with my new friends. I'm hop___ to dr___ around a__ see a__ the decor_____ lights o_ the tr___ and ho___, a__ sing car___ with m_ neighbors. If I'm lucky, I'll receive some thoughtful gifts too!
data.answer: 这是我在美国的第一个圣诞节，我真的很期待和我的新朋友一起庆祝。我希望开车到处转转，看看树上和家里的装饰灯，和邻居们一起唱圣诞颂歌。如果幸运的话，我还会收到一些贴心的礼物!
